subtitles.text: This is really said by the members and others,
When someone sings a phrase of a song,
When someone sings a phrase of a song, they cut out a part of the song and continue singing it forever.
Rina, you're singing that again," I am often told,
When I get into it, it's very noisy.
There are people who sing during that period all the time.
And they only sing that phrase,
When they get hooked, they are very noisy.
Also, recently, I've been thinking about food,
Yuzu, banana juice, and baby sponge cakes,
They are quite addicted to them, aren't they?
Yes, they are. There are a lot of them,
Once they get hooked, they usually stay hooked,
They even recommend them to their friends,
I think people who are not interested in it are probably annoyed by it.
The thing I have been most addicted to so far is....
I guess I've been addicted to hamburgers for a long time.
That was when I was in high school,
I ate hamburgers about five times a week,
In high school, you eat a lot, don't you?
I eat in the morning, eat in the morning when I get to school, eat for lunch, eat after school,
I ate snacks, ate at night, and ate dinner at night,
At the end of the school day, we would eat hamburgers at the break.
No, not the cafeteria, but outside.
But even homosexuals have an image of the proposal.
But I have lost a lot of weight since I was in high school.
You have lost a lot of weight?
Yes, I have lost a lot of weight.
I sweat for all kinds of people in the world.
We ate hamburgers at the meeting.
We had hamburgers for lunch and then hamburgers at night.
We ate hamburgers for lunch and hamburgers for dinner.
Do you have a favorite place?
There are a lot of raw hamburgers these days.
The skin is a little rough and rare.
But he likes the fresh hamburger steak the best.
It can only be found in Shizuoka.
I like the fact that you can't get there quickly and the difference in the center of gravity.
There is also a hamburger restaurant in Shinjuku that I really want to go to,
I have tried twice, and both times I couldn't get in.
Is there such a hamburger restaurant?
I was thinking of going there for the third time.
What kind of hamburgers are they?
It's a hamburger steak restaurant that is popular nowadays, and the hamburgers are thick and almost raw.
I would love to hear what you think if you go there.
I would love to go there.
I heard that Rina-san is very picky when it comes to hamburgers.
It's true that this might be another story that I don't get a chance to talk about.
